storeInfoPage.policyy: Before payment, the customer should review the available payment methods, and before ordering, the user should carefully read the product description. In the product notes section, the customer can write their notes, which will be implemented as much as possible and are not mandatory for the store.
storeInfoPage.branchess: Jerusalem, Tel Aviv, Beer Sheva, Netanya
storeInfoPage.aboutUss: The specialist store is an online store focused on providing high-quality products that mimic fashion and style in the Arab and Gulf markets, and globally, at competitive prices accessible to everyone.
storeInfoPage.currentPromotions: Save up to 50% with Deal Coupons. Get a big discount on products or save money using coupons during checkout.
storeInfoPage.customerReviewss: Customer reviews help find businesses that make a good impression on shoppers, boosting their confidence in the businesses and assisting them in making informed purchase decisions.
storeInfoPage.paymentMethodsList: We accept payment via credit cards, PayPal, and more.
storeInfoPage.shippingDetails: Shipping is available to all areas. Delivery within 3-5 business days.
